author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description:
Generates a bpa report.
Steps:
- Get configuration file of Pan-OS/Panorama. If the user provided an entry_id to a config file this step is skipped.
- Use the information retrieved above to generate a BPA report.
- During this process the API also generates a report_id.
commands.name: aiops-bpa-report-generate

integration.description: Palo Alto Networks Best Practice Assessment (BPA) analyzes NGFW and Panorama configurations and compares them to the best practices.
integration.name: Palo Alto Networks AIOps

description: Palo Alto Networks Best Practice Assessment (BPA) analyzes NGFW and Panorama configurations.
name: Palo Alto Networks AIOps
readme:
## Palo Alto Networks AIOPS

- AIOps for NGFW analyzes device telemetry and best practice assessment results to give you a comprehensive understanding and proactive checks for your deployment health and security posture.
- This content pack enables XSOAR to integrate with Palo Alto Networks AIOps. It includes one integration.
